input.sentences: today was my day to do my presentation at college .
i think i did a great job !
the rest of the class was taking notes while i was speaking
they would then be tested on what i presented
finally.. the end of my presentation . i got an a
output.sentences: We had a speaker come to our school today.
She talked for a really long time.
Some of the students got a bit nored.
I was nearly asleep by the end of her long talk.
All in all, we did not learn much but did get some points for it.
